feature.label: JQuest Plugin
feature.description: The JQuest plugin can be used to analyse and explore the architecture of a program. The plugin allows exploring relationships between classes, packages, and jars. The plugin uses the Guery library to perform antipattern analysis. The following antipatterns are supported: circular dependencies between packages, abstraction without decoupling, degenerated inheritance, and subtype knowledge.
